about_the_game:
In Pirates: Digital Strategy Game, an online turn-based strategy game, you can build fleets of powerful ships from the age of piracy, to challenge your friends in a conquest to achieve victory by sinking enemy ships or by exploring treasure-rich islands scattered across the randomly generated maps.



Collect and trade ships or crew with unique stats and abilities to build your fleet and sail into battle in matches against up to 9 other players. First, choose a home island and spawn your ships. Then, in a turn based race, be the first to explore enough islands and bring enough gold back to base or try to sabotage other players by engaging in naval combat, utilizing your ships cannons to rip through opponents masts at the roll of a die and unleashing abilities to give yourself strategic advantages or hinder your enemies.

Features

  • Ship and Crew collection and trading
  • Multiplayer matches with up to 10 players
  • Singleplayer versus bots
  • Deck (fleet) building
  • Random map generation
  • Fleet commandment
  • Unique ship and crew abilities
